content: elevate your crochet skills with the aspen valley cowl pattern perfect for advanced beginners worked in the round this cowl showcases the beauty of whatever yarn you use with a well-written pattern and right and left-handed video tutorials this project is sure to become a staple in your handmade wardrobe **unique features-** seamless construction for a polished finish captivating textured stitch pattern works up quickly with medium weight yarn **materials needed-** hook 8mm us size 11 0 yarn shown in red heart super saver brushed https //amzn to/4nr6upv aran weight 250 yards
